docs.title: Welcome to the Datadog Cloud DFIR Training!
docs.text: In this week's training we will be learning how to investigate cloud-based incidents. Throughout the training you will have the opportunity to get hands-on experience by working through a series of labs. Some of these labs will be focused on individual techniques while some will present an end-to-end attack scenario.

docs.title: Lab 1: Basic AWS Attack Technique Investigation
Logs
docs.text: The logs for this lab fall within the following time frame: <tbd>. We can use the following filter to focus on the CloudTrail logs in the relevant AWS account: index:cloudtrail

docs.title: Investigation
docs.text:
An attacker did a bad thing. Let's investigate.
